== The Homepage of Abhinay Omkar ==
Hi, I am Abhinay Omkar, i have been using GNU/Linux from past six years and Ubuntu ever since Breezy came out. I am a fan of Debian and Gentoo too.
I have a great passion on GNU and its philosophy, My like & do programming (mostly Python), IRCing, Blogging, Reading Newsletters, Blogs and Hacking.
